name: YOU CAN ONLY DIE 80 TIMES (Wendy Wildshape)
name_original: YOU CAN ONLY DIE 80 TIMES (Wendy Wildshape)
description:
Dear , have incurred my fearsome wrath! Love, Nummer,
supreme wizard

Cursed by the fearsome wrath of the supreme wizard Nummer to become immortal, try to defy this annoyance by making rself only able to die 80 more times. But the kicker is, brought this on rself, first by ruining her spaghetti dinner one time, and later mis-casting r spell to break out of her curse, reducing r immortality to being able to die only 80 times. To top it all off, are on the way home and stuck in the Field Corridor, a dangerous zone. r only help now is the fact that  can safely die 80 times, but keep in mind that it is only 80 times that can die! If that wasn't bad enough, every time do die, up to the limit of 80, r grasp of reality will be shaken dramatically by the withering curse of supreme wizard Nummer!

WANT TO KNOW MORE? CLICK HERE FOR THE REAL STORY...

Use The Arrows to play the game!

A wonderful collaboration with Dalia Coss and Nikki Bee.
